etymologies: late Middle English: from Old French, diminutive of helme, of Germanic origin; related to helm

definitions: a hard or padded protective hat, various types of which are worn by soldiers, police officers, firefighters, motorcyclists, athletes, and others.
shortDefinitions: hard or padded protective hat, various types

definitions: the arched upper part (galea) of the corolla in some flowers, especially those of the mint and orchid families.
shortDefinitions: arched upper part galea of corolla in some flowers

definitions: a predatory mollusk with a squat heavy shell, living in tropical and temperate seas and preying chiefly on sea urchins.
shortDefinitions: predatory mollusc with squat heavy shell
